title: Friend didn't instantly receive gift
body:
Please help, my friend hasn't received his gift and it usually sends immediately.

I just dont want the money i spent to fall into the abyss :c  And i want him to get it now.... its been over an hour and he is playing with me right now

replies.body:
You may want to have your friend restart their client or their computer. This may cause the notification to pop up. ^.^

Let me know if this worked!
I have the same problem restarting the client dose not seem to work

Oh hey got it!

He called me a little bitch but he got it!
i have the same problem already tried restarting client and pc still didnt work my friend sent me a star guardian missfortune and a mystery skin plz help
